Package com.testpaper.model

Class Test

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.model.Test
@Entity public class Test extends Object
The Test class represents a test entity in the system. It contains information such as the test ID, title, description, maximum marks, number of questions, active status, subject, and questions associated with the test.
Since:
21-06-2023
Version:
17
Author:
TPG team
